name: Stitch Money Corporation
description: Operator of a financial API platform intended to securely link bank accounts with a lightweight single sign-on experience. The company's platform connects directly to the existing infrastructure of banks for seamless integration with compliance, enabling clients to have a seamless user experience, one-click, fraud-free bank payments and easy access to financial data.
